about_the_game:
Genre-Busting Action

Raiders Rise blends the best of MOBA and Battle Royale genres, creating what we proudly call Full PvPE (Player vs. Player vs. Environment). Strategize, cooperate, and compete as space mercenaries, battling alien bosses, dodging traps, and racing to claim precious crystals—the ultimate energy source in a galaxy full of chaos.

Play Fair, Look Good

The game is Free to Play and monetized in a way that respects the player. Cosmetics like character skins and ship designs are purely for style, offering no game play advantages. A seasonal pass adds exclusive rewards for those who want extra flair, but fair play remains at the core of our philosophy.

Vibrant Art and Deep Lore

Immerse yourself in a colorful, futuristic world with exaggerated designs and a rich backstory. Play as space mercenaries hired by galactic factions, each with unique motivations and histories tied to the coveted crystals. The narrative sneaks into every detail, rewarding players who dig a little deeper.

What’s Next?

Currently in development, Raiders Rise is headed for Early Access on Steam in September 2025. A mobile version is in the works post-PC launch to ensure a polished, balanced experience. Expect regular updates with fresh content like new skins, maps, and modes—because the fun doesn’t stop at launch.

Join Us

Our community lives on Discord, where you can share feedback, report bugs, or just hang out with fellow raiders. Early adopters might even score exclusive goodies—designed with your input, of course.

Ready to raid? Buckle up for a journey full of strategy, chaos, and galactic shenanigans!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel I3-7100 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for playing at 720p@30fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel I7-8700K or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended requirements for playing at 1080p@60fps

short_description: Raiders Rise is a multiplayer action-strategy game where teams of space raiders compete to collect crystals on exotic planets. Balance teamwork and tactics to outsmart rivals, survive alien threats, and overcome environmental challenges.
